pullRequest.title: Make transform functions support underscore in the query functions
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
This PR is to support any underscore in transform functions. e.g. IN_ID_SET, ARRAY_SUM, ARRAY_AVERAGE, etc.
Sample query:
SELECT arrary_sum(intsColum) FROM myTable;

commit.message: Make transform functions support underscore in the query functions

beforeCommit.message: Make transform functions support underscore in the query functions

afterCommit.message: Make transform functions support underscore in the query functions

nodes.bodyText: You can remove the toLowerCase() here
